titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation touching the adjournement of part of Easter terme, and His Majesties proceedings concerning wardships and lyveries
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at His Majesties court at Oxford, the first day of April, in the nineteenth yeare of His Majesties raigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
